title: eat in the morning
init_text: I always eat in the morning, it help help me gain my enegry in the morning.

title: going to happen
init_text: Had he known what was going to happen, he would have never stepped into the shower.

title: paint with colors
init_text: She only paints with bold colors; she does not like pastels.

title: Kid have been warned
init_text: Her mom had warned her. She had been warned time and again, but she had refused to believe her. She had done everything right and she knew she would be rewarded for doing so with the promotion. So when the promotion was given to her main rival, it not only stung, it threw her belief system into disarray. It was her first big lesson in life, but not the last.

title: New day
init_text: The day had begun on a bright note. The sun finally peeked through the rain for the first time in a week, and the birds were sinf=ging in its warmth. There was no way to anticipate what was about to happen. It was a worst-case scenario and there was no way out of it.

title: Story about sandcastle
init_text: The wave crashed and hit the sandcastle head-on. The sandcastle began to melt under the waves force and as the wave receded, half the sandcastle was gone. The next wave hit, not quite as strong, but still managed to cover the remains of the sandcastle and take more of it away. The third wave, a big one, crashed over the sandcastle completely covering and engulfing it. When it receded, there was no trace the sandcastle ever existed and hours of hard work disappeared forever.

title: Who's fault?
init_text: It's not his fault. I know you're going to want to, but you can't blame him. He really has no idea how it happened. I kept trying to come up with excuses I could say to mom that would keep her calm when she found out what happened, but the more I tried, the more I could see none of them would work. He was going to get her wrath and there was nothing I could say to prevent it.

title: cabbage
init_text: They throw cabbage that turns your brain into emotional baggage.

title: Emotional
init_text: He is good at eating pickles and telling women about his emotional problems.

title: The street
init_text: It's not often you find a soggy banana on the street.

title: The horse
init_text: Pink horses galloped across the sea.

title: Reason
init_text: There's a reason that roses have thorns.

title: Vague
init_text: He had a vague sense that trees gave birth to dinosaurs.
